meta.title: Games United
meta.description: We are a Venture Builder which enables startup teams with capital, vision, and strategic direction. Unlike gaming VC’s, a venture builder deals with the day-to-day operations and strategic decisions to grow the new business.s

description.title: Welcome to Games United
description.description: Games United is an independent Digital Entertainment Content Factory with a distinct focus on mobile gaming. Founded in 2021 by experienced entrepreneurs, Games United has achieved to receive investments from Investors in January 2023. We create fun & engaging casual mobile games bu seamlessly integrating art, coding, psychology, intellectual property and storytelling. Our motto is 'Game is Beyond Gaming!'

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.description: The key points of our adventure!

elements.title: Q3 - 2023
elements: Layer AI & Turbine Games Strategic Alliance

universecsoon.title: Our Universe Is Future Of Gaming
universecsoon.description: Studios working in a multidiciplinary structure produce games that are more innovative and connected to the Games United Universe!

meta.title: Merge Park | Games United
meta.description: We are a Venture Builder which enables startup teams with capital, vision, and strategic direction. Unlike gaming VC’s, a venture builder deals with the day-to-day operations and strategic decisions to grow the new business.s

main.description:
Merge for surprises, discover the story, meet new friends. Explore the adventurous 
Merge Park and design your amusement park. 
Let's merge!

discover.title: Discover New Areas and Complete Story!
discover.description: Merge new assets and travel undiscovered lands...
discover.sub-description: Discover new places, merge different items and meet amazing new objects. Merge to create and play with new rides in every area.

characters.title: Meet New Friends...
characters.description:
Encounter lively and unforgettable characters as you progress through the map. Each new friend you meet not only adds a unique and vibrant dimension to your adventure but also becomes a friend, guiding you to unexplored paths and helping you unlock new areas.

Together, embark on journeys that will become lifelong memories...

design.title: Design Your Park!
design.description: Merge and transform objects to reveal new wonders. On Customization Design Island, add your unique touch, crafting a park that mirrors your style. Experience the joy of personalization and discovery within a world brimming with creative possibilities.

download.title: Download Now!
download.description: Merge new assets and travel undiscovered lands...

gameblock.title: Merge Park
gameblock.description: Welcome to Merge Park! Are you ready to revive the once-existing world's best amusement park? Help Emma and her friends and bring the amusement park back to life.

cookie-popup.description: We use cookies in line with our privacy policy to provide you with a better service. For more information about cookies,

options.title: Strictly necessary
options.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.

options.title: Performance
options.description: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.

options.title: Targeting
options.description: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.
